website_summaries.verdict: The Logitech Z205 USB-powered speakers are an easy, inexpensive tool for mobile music lovers to increase volume levels and enjoy better sound quality on the run.

customer_reviews.title: Save and worthy
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is loud wow..i use it long time ago for my laptop way before have bluetooth speaker..use it for long time still work
customer_reviews.author: jefri

customer_reviews.title: I bought this in October, 2012 for $25. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in October, 2012 for $25. Writing this in July, 2016. I have no idea why it shows $169 right now. Works as expected for the price. Amplifies sound well, but obviously not close to table-top speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Here is my long overdue review from 2010. I don't remember.
customer_reviews.text: Here is my long overdue review from 2010. I don't remember.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound and great design
customer_reviews.text: Wow. So impressed with the sound on these little speakers. LOVE how it clips on and seems integrated with the laptop. I do sales presentations and the sound of laptop speakers always stinks. The sound out of this speaker system blew me away. Such a great deal for the price. The bass sound is not amazing but you won't notice it unless you're really listening for it as the mid and high ranges are so good. Sure, probably not most amazing speakers ever made, but they've just got to be the best around for cheap notebook speakers. Combine the great sound with the great form factor and functionality and it's a winner. Big time.
customer_reviews.author: Theropod-X

customer_reviews.title: Love This Speaker
customer_reviews.text: We recently refreshed our computers here at work and i received a laptop. I dock the laptop at work so the lid is always closed. Because of this, my laptop speakers are muffled. I wanted a USB only speaker solution and these worked out great. So good in fact that my boss and another gentlemen wanted a speaker as well. So now i have purchased 3 so far and will come back for more when needed. The price is a bit high but it does sound really good and takes up hardly any space at all.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: 1st set were DOA right out of the box. Crummy quality control over at Logitech. So I decided to RMA back to amazon. What a great experience with doing an RMA with Amazon. Got the replacement and was BLOWN AWAY at the sound. These things are amazing. No, they won't give you "earth moving bass", but the quality is fantastic. My review mirrors many of ones here, works great to watch movies on a laptop. Using the freeware VLC mp3/video player at [...] I can really pump out the sound volume since it gives much more control of various volume setting than WinMedia Player does.
customer_reviews.author: D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected, which is a plus. Great sound for such a compact speaker. Much, much, much better than my laptop speaker! Plan to use this little guy soon for a video presentation at my parents' 60th wedding anniversary celebration. (Yes, it works that well!) Attaches securely by clip to the top or side (wherever you wish) of laptop monitor. Can just pick up laptop and move from room to room with speaker playing. Comes with a handy carrying bag. Would definitely buy again. Sound is as good as more expensive and less portable speakers I have. Great buy for $20!!!
customer_reviews.author: Greer Yellow Jacket fan

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I watch a lot of movies on my laptop and the sound was just not loud enough for me to put the laptop down and be 2 - 3 feet away from it. So, I bought the. The speaker was a bit smaller than I expected, but no big deal. The sound quality isn't bad, not the best, but okay. Unfortunately, the sound doesn't go much louder than the laptop speakers. It's handy to have and my kids borrow it for their laptops, too. Over all, it's not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than BOSE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought myself a Bose soundwave system for my birthday and was going to buy an adapter so that I could play Pandora on my laptop. I saw this laptop speaker and read the reviews. I said try this first before you spend $150 for something you don't need. Well, I am on my laptop typing this review and listening to Pandora radio and guess what - tomorrow I am returning the Bose soundwave system and get my money back. This little speaker sounds good for under $50 - worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: bbw857

customer_reviews.title: If your laptop speakers are weak, this is the unit to have !
customer_reviews.text: My netbook speakers are almost inaudible if the room is any noisier than a library, headphones aren't always a good solution, but this little speaker provides surprisingly good sound quality, powered from the USB, and it's not too big. There is an aux input, but it requires power from the USB port to power the speaker (no batteries involved here). The clamp works ok on the thin netbook, but not great. If sound quality is important to you, you'll like it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Farney

customer_reviews.title: Did exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have a Toshiba L505 laptop that I love except the speakers are weaker than a good set of headphones. So, inorder to watch a movie or listen to music without headphones, I bought this little speaker. What a surprise that this little speaker could put out so much sound. I am very happy with it. My only problem is that the clip slips off the computer. I highly recommend getting this if you need to get better sound out of your laptop/notebook.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Helsing

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for elder geeks
customer_reviews.text: Bought these speakers for my father, who at the age of 84 has just started computing. He has a laptop, but with his hearing problems, often has trouble distinguishing what's being said over the laptop's subpar speakers. These logitech speakers worked great. They plug into a USB port for power, clamp easily on the top of the laptop lid, and their clarity and additional volume means he can hear videos, talk with us on Skype, etc. Good job, Logitech!
customer_reviews.author: K. D. Webber

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Speaker
customer_reviews.text: The Only reason I didn't didn't give this Very Nicely Designed speaker is I was hoping for More volume range.
customer_reviews.author: Snake Hollow

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Loved it at first - the clips wouldn't always stay securely on top of my Gateway EC1440u netbook but wasn't a big deal. After four months it stopped working. Attempted to exchange it for a replacement, but never heard back from Amazon or the manufacturer. I'm a frequent Amazon shopper and with all other purchases have had great experiences, but I'd avoid this if you're not willing to pay for a replacement within a year.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: The sound is STILL better than every computer I've owned since
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is still alive long after the computer I initially bought it for. The sound is STILL better than every computer I've owned since.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Better than my laptop speakers
customer_reviews.text: What should have I expected? I thought a little more than what I received. This speaker is an improvement over my Dell laptop speakers but quite frankly anything is better than my Dell speakers. Bought myself an Apple TV now I remotely and wirelessly play my music through my home theatre/entertainment system. Now that's a big improvment. This logitech speaker is handy for travel and that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Speakers
customer_reviews.text: The speakers that came on my laptop are not very good at all. These speakers are very handy, you just clip them on the edge of the laptop, plug it in to the usb port and you are good to go. Very simple. Not a fabulous stereo sound system but they make it possible to hear clearly. You will have to be right in front of your computer to use these though because they are not very loud. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: B.H.

customer_reviews.title: These speakers have great sound. The power source is through the USB ...
customer_reviews.text: These speakers have great sound. The power source is through the USB cord as is the feed of sound in the other direction, so only one short cord connects laptop and speaker. That this clips on to the edge of the laptop screen makes using the speaker so easy. Brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: csueyoungster

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: I had been using my laptop in bed with two little speakers that the wires kept entangling or shorting in the wires. I love this little speaker, it is perfect for my use. I have it clipped at the top of my Toshiba and no more tangled wires. As some others have said if you are expecting top quality sound this is not for you. Volume control is very limited and it does take over the computer sound, but that is fine with me. I don't regret buying this, so far it is working fine for my gaming while in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Larisa

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommmend this speaker to anyone who has a laptop and and likes to watch movies. Before getting this speaker I would miss hearing parts of a movie and had the sound turned all the way up. This speaker is great!! I actually have the sound turned down low, and can hear perfectly. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Mcdaniel

customer_reviews.title: Portable AND Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Constantly faced with a wall of iPhone speaker options when looking for portable audio spakers, this was a nice surprise. This powers by usb, and adapts to digital audio output. If you prefer to use the headphone jack for your audio, or analog 3.5mm out from another media device or mp3 player, this is pure WIN. While in digital audio mode, the volume and power control work flawlessly. I've used in the Ubuntu 10.04 (Lucid Lynx) and can attest yo it good sound and ease-of-use. Only cons that I know of: will not clamp to the thicker LCD monitors, but should suffice for LCD laptop thickness. However, the clamp is designed to also function as a free standing pedestal.
customer_reviews.author: L. Easterly

customer_reviews.title: it's an excellent product. For general use
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's an excellent product. For general use, especially DVDs, it's great. It seems to lack on the bass, quite a bit, so, if you're "All about that bass", you would need to add a woofer or some such.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Holland

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long?
customer_reviews.text: I got so tired of having to put on a headset to get decent sound while watching tv or movies on my laptop, so decided to look for external speakers made for laptops. This gives pretty good sound, is easy to use and takes up very little space in my laptop case. I'm so glad I bought this! June 23, 2011: Edited to say that after less than a year, the speaker no longer works.
customer_reviews.author: N. Mininger

customer_reviews.title: Great sound great price.
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews before I purchased, I was a little afraid the speakers would be too quiet. They are definitely very loud for portable speakers. Very impressed/satisfied! My original laptop speakers sucked. These kick ass. They are just as loud as my original laptop speakers set at 100/100 when they are only set at 6/100. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer1611

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are just right for watching videos on your laptop. I would prefer they had a regular speaker jack connection, though. You can't just plug them in/out while a movie is playing. You have to close and reopen your program before the speakers will be recognized, which is a little annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Shooter McGavin

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound bar
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to get a bit clearer and louder sound out of my laptop. I get my voice mail through my laptop speakers and the tinny speakers in the laptop are poor. I got this expecting an ok laptop speaker but I got a very good laptop speaker and it has inputs for a line out of my MP3 player. Great sound in the hotel room.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hitch

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an external speaker that would not take up table space but I also thought that this product would provide more sound than the speakers on the laptop (i.e., I needed it to be louder). It did not get louder although the product worked fine. It just wasn't what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and I received it the next day even though I paid for only two day shipping. The speakers are probably loud enough, but I'm a little hard of hearing and I wished they were a little louder. But this depends on the program. The speakers generally are of good sound quality especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rocquael

customer_reviews.title: Small speaker with great sound
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a solution to weak sound on my HP laptop and these speakers fill the bill. They are light and attach fairly securely to the top of the screen (don't move the computer while they're attached). The sound is now adequate for all uses. Good sound,compact,fairly priced,and of excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: CD23V

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: It's small, compact, the jaws hold onto your laptop firmly and there is protective rubber so it will not scratch anything, it is quite loud for its size and sounds great, especially if placed close to a hard surface. Works great for watching movies on my laptop..
customer_reviews.author: Rene Roberts

customer_reviews.title: DOES IT DELIVER??????
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT THIS FOR MY WIFE'S CHEAP DELL LAPTOP THATS 3 YEARS OLD THE SPEAKERS SUCK. BOUGHT THIS ON THE RECOMMENDATION OF OTHERS AND LOGITECH'S REP. THEY MAKE A GOOD PRODUCT. THESES ARE GREAT SPEAKERS FOR THE SIZE. THEY SOUND BETTER THAN MY NEW TOSHIBA LAPPY WITH HARMON/KARDON SPEAKERS. I DONT RECOMMEND ANYTHING THAT DOESNT DELLIVER. THESE ARE NOT A/C POWERED SURROUND SPKS. BUT THEY ARE COMPACT AND YOU CAN MOVE TO ANOTHER ROOM WITHOUT LEAVIN G THE SPKS BEHIND. ALSO,I CAN HERE THESE THESE THINGS FROM TWO ROOMS AWAY! JUST GET UM.
customer_reviews.author: Dino Canchola

customer_reviews.title: It's Great!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few days and have been very pleased. The sound quality is really good and it is super easy to use--total plug and play! I have a HP laptop and the in laptop speakers are horrible. This makes listening to music/videos so much better! I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Spring Peep

customer_reviews.title: Very good headset for travel
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Let my netbook play music/sound without wearing headset The upper and mid range is very good but I wish it can have a little more base.For it's size I couldn't ask for more. Anyway, I highly recommend this speaker when you travel with netbook.
customer_reviews.author: KFT

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This little clip-on speakers for notebooks is a great improvement over the notebook's speakers. Sound quality is very acceptable. Its actually better than the under $50 box type speakers that I have tried. The only complaint might be the USB cable - its a little stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Z205
customer_reviews.text: Using as the speaker for my mini-itx build. Great being USB, no power cord. Clips to the top of my thin monitor. Have a very portable desktop with VESA mounted box and wireless everything. only have 2 power cords to unplug to move unit
customer_reviews.author: David Crowder

customer_reviews.title: Love the sound
customer_reviews.text: I was lucky enough to hear these speakers before I purchased them. The sound improvement on my PC, which had a terrible speaker system, was so improved that I started gathering music again for my laptop. For the money and for what they are used for it's a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: vitocera

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sound!
customer_reviews.text: After reading so many different reviews I wasn't expecting much from a laptop speaker, but since you couldn't hear anything from my laptop without headphones I had to try something. I was more than pleasantly surprised at the sound quality for the price. It was so easy to use. Just clip on, plug into a USB port and it's ready to go. The volume was plenty loud . I'm no sound expert, but the sound quality is everything I need to listen to music, watch movies and play games. It looks good too. I would recommend this to anyone looking to purchase an inexpensive external speaker for their laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Debra H Carr

customer_reviews.title: I like the speakers
customer_reviews.text: I like the look, easy to use and sound pretty good. Boring days in the office watching a movie is great with these speakers. Wish they opened up to allow a webcam to work but they would cover the logitech logo =) cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great product with a great price!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this little speaker system for my wife's mini-laptop. She uses a "text-to-speech" program and the builtin speaker is weak. This makes a huge difference. Logitech always seems to "score" for me, great products and very reasonable prices.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive laptop speaker alternative
customer_reviews.text: Take it out of the box, clip it on, plug in the USB port and enjoy. A simple, inexpensive speaker that should improve your laptop built-ins. Good sound projection, a bit tinny, and meager bass(you should expect this), but it still is a decent upgrade for my laptop at a fair price. I listened on interent radio and was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Going Coastal

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker with volume
customer_reviews.text: It was just as advertised and arrived promptly. It has great volume, especially if you have a hard time hearing other things on your laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Jan R.

customer_reviews.title: I'm Happy...
customer_reviews.text: I'm Happy with the Function, Price and Simplicity..Meets My Expectations and Serves My Purposes..I No Longer have to Strain to Listen Anymore..My hearing is Not what it used to be, but Hey, what is??I watch and Listen to a Variety of Videos and Live Streams and it's Nice to experience both the Visual and Audio...I have Purchased Other Logitech Products in the Past and have always been Pleased with the Quality...
customer_reviews.author: David Rodden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really nice, fits on my 11" notebook, you can even watch movies while on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W. Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker option for Ultra Compact Notebooks and Netbooks
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky being an ex sound engineer. These speakers are a great option. You have to remember they are, a compact external speaker system. I have a Toshiba Satellite T115 Ultra compact notebook which I love except the speakers are not what I wanted but due to the small form factor thats to be expected. This speaker system looks great, does not put too much weight on my screen, has plenty of volume and is very clear. Over all this is a great speaker option that has great sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: It's tiny, doesn't really fall of unless you like shake it hard. It clips on. I only get confused on how to activate it, because mostly I listen to music through my headphones and when I unplug my headphones all I get is my laptop speakers, but it's okay, it's my fault, I will figure out a way. Pretty good product:)
customer_reviews.author: Tors

customer_reviews.title: one of the bests
customer_reviews.text: At first I am skeptic on buying this speaker but I was surprise how this speaker turned out to be perfect for my 14 inches laptop. One of my fave accessories, indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Felicity

customer_reviews.title: Innovative
customer_reviews.text: purchased this speaker for my husband because he works remotely. sometimes at home, work office, construction trailer, starbucks, etc. this is a compact portable speaker with some good sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita

customer_reviews.title: I did like it, while it worked
customer_reviews.text: I did like it, while it worked. I only used it about 3 times and it no longer works at all.
customer_reviews.author: L. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for good sound on Dell laptop
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is easy to use (plug and play), fits well, and works. Watching movies on a Dell laptop was nearly impossible since the sound was bad. This is small, portable, and makes the laptop more functional.
customer_reviews.author: Yikes!

customer_reviews.title: Nice Speaker Choice
customer_reviews.text: Great for a laptop or notebook with chintzy speakers. One USB cable included for power, no A/C adapter required. Clips on top edge of laptop and has power/volume control. Just a very nifty product with a fair price made by a name-brand company.
customer_reviews.author: Kent W. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it does
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this product to prevent further damage I was causing to my laptop speakers. When I dont have my laptop hooked up to my stereo, I use it for everything. Music, movies, TV. As long as you don't plan on pushing its limits and blasting the speakers then the sound quality is great. Use it for what it is intended (bedrooms and other small areas) and you have a perfect device.
customer_reviews.author: Mwoz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker load enough but small enough for a laptop to mount on top or sides
customer_reviews.author: Smalls

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker on June 30 and was not thrilled with the sound but it was at least better that the wimpy speakers on my Dell laptop so I could at least hear a movie. But after only 6 weeks the cable is broken. My return option to Amazon ended on July 30. I checked the Logitech website to see if there is a replacement cable but there is no replacement for this model. I realize that this was very inexpensive but I would expect to get more than 6 weeks of use for $25. My advise - don't buy this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: zzangel

customer_reviews.title: Movie theater sound! :)
customer_reviews.text: I've never HEARD my videos, my music, my movies sound SO GOOD AS THIS EVER before!! It sounds like "movie theater" quality to me! :)
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: great choice!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son for Christmas. He loves it! He hooked it up and played some music for us on his laptop. It has great sound and a lot of power. We are all very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Speaker works great!
customer_reviews.text: Clips right on to top of laptop screen. Sound is very, very good. Great for games or watching movies. We've tried the plug-in external speakers before and were very disappointed, but not this time. I would recommend this speaker to anyone. Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: sandshotz

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker, i can hear all of my music veery good now also it adds a very nice touch when listening to netflix you can hear everything so clearly. great price and great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Platinii

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a great help because the speakers on my laptop are not very good .
customer_reviews.author: Don Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Loud with Above Average Quality.
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are easy to install, just connect the USB cord to the computer. Can become VERY LOUD! Even the lower settings can be heard through the next room, so be considerate with the volume! Quality is pretty good, and sounds like a mini-home theater. While there's a jack in the back of the speakers, they must be used for another speaker, because headphones don't work in the jack.
customer_reviews.author: ShiftyMenstruel

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The speakers are great quality--not super high quality, but rather good for the non-audiophiles. They are somewhat bulky, but definitely solid and of great manufacturing quality. The single USB power/data cable makes it easy to use and transport without the hassle for a power cable. The protective case is a nice extra touch. I would recommend this product to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Azura

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is not loud, but it's a big improvement over the laptop speakers. The are small so they travel well. They sound alright. They are good at what they were meant to do.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Good sound for the money!
customer_reviews.text: For better than laptop speakers sound, this clip-on stereo speakers make watching videos, and listening to music easy and enjoyable. Are these Bose quality sound, no. Are these great for stereo listening, surfing the web and enjoying your playlist, yes. The clip-on is great, as it also stands easily. Compared to what else is on the market at this time, these are great and I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kalina

customer_reviews.title: I CAN HEAR NOW!
customer_reviews.text: My laptop speakers were not sufficient for listening to conversation in many instances. With this, I can not only hear, but also understand.
customer_reviews.author: Tom B.

customer_reviews.title: Tough speaker system
customer_reviews.text: sturdily built, good sound, shame about the position of the connector, right by the clip - be careful not to break it.
customer_reviews.author: HHH

customer_reviews.title: Z205 speaker
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I thought I would take a chance and purchase this speaker. For it's size, which is small, it produces excellent sound. Very clear highs but of course a speaker of this size is not going to produce much bass. You can adjust the sound with the equalizer in windows media player, itunes, etc. to get suprisingly good results. I was satisfied enough with the quality of this speaker to get one as a gift for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: nedly

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Speakers
customer_reviews.text: I read several reviews for these speakers and decided to purchase them to use with a very small notebook. They are amazing. Tiny but with a great sound. I have yet to hear any laptop of any size except the MacBook Pro which packs a better sound than these speakers. For anyone who wants to listen to radio, video, or other audi, these are a "must-buy" item.
customer_reviews.author: William G. Brown

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: i have this for almost 3 years now i love it, when i use it ,, i know there wireless out there and that will be my next one to buy but this was a very good buy
customer_reviews.author: todd

customer_reviews.title: Happy to have the Logitech Laptop Speaker Z205
customer_reviews.text: I like the option of standing the speaker up or attaching to the frame. The sound isn't the absolute best, however for the price it performs very well. I would recommend this to anyone that has difficulty hearing some of the movies etc on their laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: No Bass
customer_reviews.text: No Bass at all... Sounds really flat... The clipping mechanism on the screen is cool... saves desk space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: space saving speakers for your lapotop
customer_reviews.text: While they aren't Bose sound quality, for the price this speaker is great to amplify the sound on your laptop, or netbook. It can clip to the top of the laptop or sit on the desk. Space saving and very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Laptop clip on speaker
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived on time. Plug and play did not work but setting the properties through "Audio Devices" was no problem- very good step by step instructions. Sound is good to excellent considering the size of the speakers.
customer_reviews.author: MAL

customer_reviews.title: More volume, please.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and ease of use is its primary attribute. At higher volume, though, sounds tinny as it vibrates the housing with annoying consequence. It is not for those wishing to play music with decent bass response as the volume I speak of is not really all that high. It's disappointing in this regard. Only adequate for viewing video, movies, etc. I won't return it but I would not purchase had I tested this product before hand.
customer_reviews.author: Standing tall

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this style of speaker for two reasons. 1 - I own several Logitech products and have always been satisfied with their quality and performance. 2 - The style is not as cumbersome as other sets of speakers. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Morris

customer_reviews.title: Speaker
customer_reviews.text: 10X better audio quality than my laptop speakers. Great wrinkle preventer. No longer have to screw up my face saying," What did he say?"
customer_reviews.author: ThaExpert

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Laptop Speaker Z205
customer_reviews.text: I love this little speaker and the fact that it does NOT need a seperate power source is a real bonus. I liked it so much that I sent one to my brother-in-law who is a missionary in Africa and he has used his A LOT over there. -Val
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: logitech laptop speaker z205 review
customer_reviews.text: very good quality and easy to use. a far improvement from my stock built-in speaker(worst comp speakers ever!)in my toshiba laptop. i would highly recommend as long as you dont expect a 'boombox' type sound. still has sufficient range to watch movies, listen to songs , and etc. a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: mr.smith

customer_reviews.title: It is okay but nothing special.
customer_reviews.text: With all the hype I thought that this speaker system was something special. It simply lets you hear the voices better but it is not a replacement for a 2.0 speaker system.
customer_reviews.author: New2Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptp Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased the Logitech Laptop Speaker Z205 for my laptop. I love it. It sounds great and great for taking with me were ever I go. It is light weight and I hardley know that it is there on my computer as I am watch a tv show or playing a game. If you are looking for a great sound source for you laptopo then the Logitech Laptop Speaker Z205 isi for you. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Levi Holst

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this little speaker, it has good quality sound, it is small enough to fit in my lap top bag, and best of all no power cords or batteries, just USB. I can not recommend this product enough.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: okay product
customer_reviews.text: it works well and loud enough but not very easy to use or manipulate when in hurry to use the product. Does make sounds from a device as long as it has a usb port.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Temby

customer_reviews.title: a little disapointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought it so that I could watch movies on my laptop. It fits and looks great, but it's not very much louder than my original lap top speakers. If it worked along with the laptop speakers than perhaps it would be loud enough, but when it's on, my laptop speakers are off. Another disapointment was the lack of stereo sound.
customer_reviews.author: nadinemalia

customer_reviews.title: I bought for a gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift and I think the person likes the idea of a speaker for his notebook.
customer_reviews.author: CrankyOne

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love my Acer 15.6 laptop; but the built-in speakers leave a lot to be desired. So naturally I came to Amazon expecting to find a speaker for my laptop. This speaker is just the right size and provides a great sound with its two small speakers. I am glad that it has volume control and an off and on button. The clip is small so I find myself just setting it alongside my laptop. Thank you Logitech for making another great computer accessory. Thank you Amazon for carrying this great product.
customer_reviews.author: sweetjeannie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally deleted my computer's audio device and couldn't get it back. So I figured I'd try this speaker which fits perfectly over the top of my laptop and doesn't take up any desk space. This speaker is amazing, it's the best sound I've ever gotten from my computer. Thank you Logitech!
customer_reviews.author: sjuntunen32

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my mom and she loves them. They have good sound and the sound level is perfect. The highest level is just a little too loud which is where you want it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry W. Barrow Jr.

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker! The sound quality excellent, much better than I expected. The size is perfect for travel. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: F-J Harmych

customer_reviews.title: Works in Linux great
customer_reviews.text: Got it to work on Arch Linux right out of the box. Used alsa and asoundconf ..all I had to do was change the default soundcard to the speaker, listed as "default" on my laptop. I am using a Thinkpad T400 and this speaker is 10x better than the built-in speakers. I'm very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Habersang

customer_reviews.title: Great portable speaker for the traveler
customer_reviews.text: This speaker gives my netbook the added volume to be able to hear a movie while traveling to remote job locatons. I use it allot. Not the best quality but for the price it cannot be beat and is great for travel use.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Crusoe

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointed in sound quality
customer_reviews.text: It's sort of tinny sounding, no low end to speak of really. Not as good as I expected, still way better than my laptop speakers, but kind of pricey for the so-so sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: T. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Laptop speakers
customer_reviews.text: Just got my speakers today(10-11-10), shipped out fast. I plugged in the speakers and restarted my machine and whala they work perfectly! The sound is great given it's compact size. I tried them on my desktop first and I love them. Way to go Logitech!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey R. Burgin

customer_reviews.title: It is a GREAT product
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 4 of these for family and friends after they listened to the GREAT sound. Compact and easy to use. Plug it in and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: It was Good While it Lasted
customer_reviews.text: At 1st I thought for $25 bucks these little speakers are definitely worth it. Easy to install. Worked awesome with my Toshiba laptop.But overtime I noticed that the volume slowly stared to get lower then one day it just stop working after only 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Kaycie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The speaker sounds great--at least it did until it died after very limited use over several weeks. It completely stopped powering up and other reviews of this product with the same problem blamed a faulty cable so perhaps that's the issue here.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Todd

customer_reviews.title: speaker
customer_reviews.text: really a good speaker for the money. not at all disappointed, but the quailty of sound isn't as good as I'm sure some of the more expensive systems, but really a nice speaker.
customer_reviews.author: b.e.haithcox

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Z205 Best Gadget Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is without a doubt the greatest gadget I've ever purchased (and I've purchased quite a few). The fidelity that comes out of this unit is so rich for it's size that my ears are still trying to believe it. You will never go back to ear buds or cumbersome headphones once you experience this unit. It's finally made my netbook experience complete. If I could, I would give it even more than five stars. Logitech, you've got a real winner here. Bravo!!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent James

customer_reviews.title: great perfomance but became defective
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this unit...when it worked. Two defective units! I liked it so much that I am giving it one more try. Great sound and light. Logitechs technicians said units could have come from a "bad batch".
customer_reviews.author: donatel

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for poor laptop speakers
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the laptop speakers. Better volume but would have liked it to be some more. Sound is better than lpatop speakers. Designis comfortable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: sandrinc

customer_reviews.title: nice and small speakers
customer_reviews.text: these speakers are really small and nice looking. they aren't too loud. they are just a little louder than my laptop speakers. sounds seems ok
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Litlle Speakers
customer_reviews.text: I Got These Speakers For My 10.1 Mini Gateway Laptop And I Was Surprised At The Sound And Quality I Would Recomend Them To Anyone Who Is Looking For Laptop Speakers
customer_reviews.author: American Express

customer_reviews.title: A great package for the Laptop.
customer_reviews.text: I got what I was looking for.A speaker that has a great sound and is compact.The sound quality is really good and the design is great too.It runs on the laptop battery via USB.What i liked is the function panel that they have provided on top of the speaker.You can switch off the speaker when not in use thus saving battery.I have a Logitech headset and I trusted the quality of their products.This one is another good buy.I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Shrikant Thakare

product_meta.title: Logitech Laptop Speaker Z205
product_meta.description:
With a lightweight, clip-on design that attaches securely to most laptops and netbooks, the Logitech Laptop Speaker Z205 is as portable as your computer—with better sound.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER




Monitor-top full-stereo speaker rocks your laptop 




The perfect size for netbooks, too 






Logitech Laptop Speaker Z205
Move around with pure digital sound 

Thanks to your laptop, you're free to listen to music, watch movies and play game all around the house. However, with both the laptop size and costs coming down, you now can't get good audio out of the built-in speakers. That's where Logitech's new laptop speaker comes in. The monitor-top design gives you much better full-stereo sound as portable as your laptop. And it puts you in the middle of an immersive sound stage that brings your songs, soundtracks and video conversations to life. 

Clip and go 
Get better sound experience on your lap, your bed, the patio or wherever you use your computer. Lightweight, clip-on design
Speaker is easy to attach, easy to remove, easy to take with you
Simply open and release the clip to mount the speaker to any laptop or notebook. The speaker stays securely in place when you carry your laptop from room to room 




A single USB connection makes 
great sound simple
You're always in the sweet spot
Dual drivers are specifically designed to provide a wide sound field to envelop you in richly detailed full-stereo sound
Top-of-monitor design also focuses the sound directly toward you
Music sounds its full and balanced best 

One cord, one-second setup
Plug a single USB cord into your laptop and you're good to go
No software or external power supply needed
Included cord powers the speaker and gives you pure digital sound instantly 

Protective carry case
Speaker's slim, compact design tucks easily into your carry-on bag or briefcase
Convenient carry case keeps your speaker protected on the go




SEE LOGITECH'S COMPLETE LINE OF ESSENTIAL NOTEBOOK ACCESSORIES FOR SUPERIOR COMFORT AND PORTABILITY
feature_bullets: Plug-and-play connection with a single USB cord
Lightweight, clip-on speaker attaches easily to laptop or netbook
Dual drivers immerse you in rich stereo sound
Travel-size (approx. 7" x 5.5" x 1.7") - complete with protective carrying case
Clean look complements the style of multi-media notebooks

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars211 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
